Articles.Content:
Since I have reached the interplanetary stage of KSP2, The game constantly freezes for around 30 seconds every 5 minutes. But the more I progressed, the more longer, and consistent the freezing became. At this point I have only 5 vessels and it is already unplayable, I can not even start up my saves. While the freeze happens my GPU in the task manager, drops from around 20% - 30% to absolute 0.

I am playing on medium preset graphics with a GEFORCE GTX 1080 Ti.

version 0.1.1.0

 

Edited April 12, 2023 by munkeymagick
I have been playing around and going back to other saves, and it seems that the freeze is happening to me only when I am near the surface or on the surface of Duna.
